name: Clickbooth
overview:
Clickbooth.com is the premier performance based network. Clickbooth connects advertisers and publishers on a CPA basis. The company has over 4,000 offers with 400 plus TRUE exclusives, and they are the AOR for the top campaigns in the industry. They have over 20,000 active affiliates in email, search, onsite, contextual and co-registration channels.

Clickbooth doesn’t work like other networks. The companyâ€™s incomparable approach is completely objective. Clickbooth’s internal system compares offers in A/B/C splits, and the offers that perform the best are the ones that get 95% of the traffic. Clickbooth also works closely with publishers in increasing and optimizing their campaigns. The company has proven that publishers & advertisers alike have complete success with their efficient, one-of-a-kind company.
